hero.title: About us
hero.subtitle: We are a team of passionate coffee lovers who have dedicated their lives to finding and delivering the best varieties from around the world

story.title: Our story
story.paragraph1: COFFEINO was born from a simple passion for quality coffee. Starting as a small family business in 2015, we have grown into a leading supplier of premium coffee in Kazakhstan and CIS countries.
story.paragraph2: Our mission is to open up unsurpassed tastes and aromas for every coffee lover that are born in the most remote corners of our planet.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We carefully select each coffee variety, working only with verified suppliers and farmers

honesty.title: Honesty
honesty.description: Transparency in work, honest prices and openness to dialogue with our customers

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We support environmentally responsible production and fair trade

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Our love for coffee inspires us every day to look for new unique tastes

alexey.name: Alexey Petrov
alexey.description: 15 years of experience in the coffee industry, traveler and coffee connoisseur

maria.name: Maria Kozlova
maria.description: Certified Q-grader, expert in coffee flavor profiles

dmitry.name: Dmitry Smirnov
dmitry.description: Responsible for expanding the range and finding new suppliers

delivery.question: How long does delivery take?
delivery.answer: Delivery to Almaty is carried out within 1-2 days, throughout Kazakhstan - 3-5 days, to CIS countries - 5-10 days.

return.question: Can I return the product?
return.answer: Yes, we accept returns within 14 days of purchase while maintaining the product appearance.

discounts.question: Are there discounts for regular customers?
discounts.answer: Yes, we have a loyalty system with cumulative discounts and special offers.

storage.question: How to store coffee?
storage.answer: Store coffee in a cool, dry place in an airtight package. Avoid direct sunlight.

delivery.title: Delivery:
delivery.description: We ship orders to Kazakhstan and CIS countries
